Add processed mel spectrograms and metadata using Git LFS

- Set up Git LFS to track .npy files

  - 999 real songs (GTZAN dataset)
- Add metadata.csv with full dataset info
- Add train/val/test split files (70/15/15)
- Update batch_preprocess.py to skip interactive prompt
- Update .gitignore to allow processed data via LFS

Total size: ~938 MB stored efficiently via Git LFS
Processing time: 49 seconds (~0.02s per song)
